title: Warning: Constructive Criticism ahead, dont read if you are a walking salt factory.
body:
Ok so i just came out of a game where i went against garen top with a riven (my mains only bronze so frankly i wasnt going to get anywhere anyway) but in my weaknesses i very quickly realised where garen is truly broken.

Some will say its his new passive which can heal him to full health just by disengaging for a few seconds, but no thats fine, tryndamere q and gangplank w both heal for alot more than garens passive and those dont make them "omgwtfop"

Is it the true damage on his ult? Well you would think that but again no, the ult requires you to be the villian and even then chogath ult does more damage or you could just look at other champs that can do true damage (sated devo master yi anyone?)

So if its not his passive, and its not his damage what is it?

Well its his q obviously.

More specifically the movespeed portion of it.
Now heres my justification, The entire juggernaut patch was supposed to be about making tanky hulk champions that move slow as balls but hit hard as fuck.

Like "you get caught you deserve to die" type champions.

So its pretty backwards giving one of said champions a movespeed boost that is literally more powerful than movespeed boosts from champions such as shyvana w or singed's ult, or ghost even.

Yes q is faster than ghost.

To put it into perspective if you were to rush Ionian boots as your first item you would have a base ms of 385, after q you go up to 480, this is enough to very easily chase down even the fastest of champs, but it gets worse, because of the relatively low cd of q along with the cdr from the boots you can just spam q over and over until you finally catch your prey.

Theres no ambushing, no skillful outplays to catch your opponent, not even any building certain items to catch up, just a "i win" button that makes him go faster than sanic and then silence you for the kill.

To put it into perspective if the ms boost was say 30 ms instead of an insane 100 ms with those boots you would atleast have to think before you q, and it wouldnt be certain death for anyone just a smidge too close (aka in range to get cs) 

Hell frankly i wouldnt care if his ult was literally a one hit kill ability with a kill reset and heals him for half the damage it dealt, if he didnt have his q.

Because even that would be more balanced than he is right now.

Tl:Dr nerf the movespeed boost or remove it entirely, it breaks the theme of the juggernaut update.
